NF.Q: In the column Consumption of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 1740? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 324 and 375? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Irrigation to node Canning and from node Harvesting to node Cleaning, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Harvesting} to node {Cleaning} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Harvesting to node Freezing, from node Food Waste to node Harvesting, and from node Import Inspection to node Consumption, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Import Inspection} to node {Consumption} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Import & Export of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Import & Export is {Import Inspection}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Import Inspection to target node Canning? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Import Inspection to node Canning is: {Import Inspection, Consumption, Harvesting, Canning}.
